transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello.
Executive: Mukherji sahab namaskar, namaste.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sumit Chaudhari baat kar raha hu sir, senior manager IndiaMART third office se. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Ji boliye boliye.
Executive: Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Ji mai achha hu boliye.
Executive: Jaise mam phone kiye the ki bola tha aap call karenge. Mere se negative feedback chal gaya tha isliye phone karenge aap bola tha.
Executive: Ha wo Mukherji sahab maine dekha ki abhi whatsapp pe aapke paas gaya tha aapne not satisfied usme mark kar diya satisfied.
Customer: Ji mai usi ke liye mam ne bhi call kiya tha. Isliye mai bol raha tha mam ko ki wo ho sakta hai by mistake hua hai kyuki mera staff ka aur mera dono whatsapp hi mobile pe bhi connected hai aur aapka computer bhi connected hai. To usme to hamara staff bhi use karta hai na ho sakta hai unhone de diya ho jaan bujh ke. Aur mail bhi connect hai aise.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Achha.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Koi baat nahi abhi mujhe ye bataiye iske alawa kuch issue to nahi hai abhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aise mam se koi issue nahi hai. Bas mam to achhi hai.
Executive: Ha ji IndiaMART ke side se?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Kyuki aapka renewal bhi hai maine socha chala gaya to wo bhi baat kar lijiye aap se.
Customer: Nahi sir renewal ke liye to mam se baat karte hi hai.
Executive: Wo mai mere samne dikha mujhe isiliye maine aap se pucha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Isiliye maine pucha matlab usme kya vichar ban raha hai?
Customer: Ji bilkul.
Executive: Usko bhi kar lete hai final? Usme kuch doubt na ho to koi doubt hai to aap puch sakte hai.
Customer: Nahi sir usme koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: To usko bhi final kar lete hai Mukherji sahab.
Customer: Kyuki maine aisi padi usme aapne Yashi se bola tha ki mai abhi nahi karunga. To maine ha to maine isiliye pucha maine kaha is baar baat karke dekh leta hu agar hai to apna kar lete hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Kyuki dekho hum bhi nahi chahte koi customer jaye Mukherji sahab hamare paas se. Jitni jyada ummid badhta hai utni jyada koshish karte hai kyuki dekho naye customer ke aane me jyada achha hai ki purane customer ruke hamare paas.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: To abhi ke liye baithe hai hum bhi agar kuch doubt hai to bataiye wo clear karte hai.
Executive: Nahi sir doubt to nahi hai. Nahi nahi nahi koi doubt nahi hai.
Executive: To isko process kar lete hai fir aage?
Customer: Ji mam ko aaj ko bhi maine bataya tha ki uske liye mai abhi filhal matlab ready nahi hu. Kyuki maine mam ko bola bhi tha ki mera jo trade India pe hai usme visibility jyada achhi mil rahi hai. To uske liye mam se baat hogi sir.
Executive: Visibility trade India pe to order place hai hi nahi hai aap achha kaise bata rahe ho?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Visibility to India trade India pe aapki dikh hi nahi rahi hai.
Customer: Ji sir uske liye mai baat kar raha hu mam ne bhi bola hai ki aapka google pe nahi dikh raha.
Customer: Ha 12 taka.
Customer: 12 taka.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Thik hai sir. Thik hai sir aap se baat baad me karta hu sir.
Executive: Aap ek ha koi baat nahi aap ek kaam kijiyega abhi aapke paas me na ek mail pe aayega satisfied not satisfied ke liye bilkul abhi ek minute ke andar.
Customer: Achha wo Yashi mam ka hoga kya?
Executive: Ha wo fir se wahi hoga kyuki aapne wo mail pe aayega lekin abhi.
Customer: Achha mail pe aaya to koi issue nahi hai. To aap bhej dijiye. Isse achha aapke employee kare aap usse pehle aap hi kar dijiyega.
Executive: Okay okay. Hai na? Nahi mai bata bhi deta hu ki koi bhi na kare kyuki mere liye kisi ka job ka usko nahi hona chahiye.
Executive: Nahi baat job ki nahi hai dekho hamare liye customer bhi important hai sir. Hamare liye aap bhi important ho.
Executive: Hamare liye hamare employee se jyada customer hai aapne agar employee rakh rakhe hai na to wo customer ke liye rakhe hue hai yaha pe.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hai na to agar aapko issue hoga to aap agar aap feedback nahi doge to fir kya fayda hai sir hamari servicing team ka kya fayda hai?
Customer: Bilkul sir.
Executive: Hai na agar aap agar ye maan ke chaliye mai jabardasti aap se satisfied ya ye sari chije karwane lag jau kyu aap paisa doge kyu aap aage business karoge IndiaMART ke sath me aapke paas bhi to authority aur rights hone chahiye na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Customer hamare liye jyada important hai mai abhi bhi aap se wahi bol raha hu.
Customer: Thik hai sir mai free nahi hu baad me kijiye.
Executive: Koi baat nahi baad me kar lete hai baad me kya ek kaam kar lete hai kal kisi time baat ho payegi aap se?
Customer: Ji kal ya parso kar lijiye aap. Sunday ka din pe Sunday ke mai free rehta hu.
Executive: Sunday to waise hum bhi free rehte hai but free hi rehte hai isiliye. Chutti ka din hota hai isiliye soch raha hu aap se ki kal ho jaye.
Customer: Oh thik hai sir to Monday kar lijiye.
Executive: Chaliye koshish karte hai kal agar time nikal paya aapko ek baar kar lunga mai.
Executive: Okay okay sir ji. Baki mail mail pe aayega abhi ispe aap satisfied kar sakte hai.
Customer: Ji. Thik hai Mukherji sahab. Thik thik thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked negative feedback by mistake.

- Wants to discuss Trade India visibility issue.

- Executive wants to discuss subscription renewal.



Resolution:

- Customer clarified negative feedback was a mistake.

- Executive explained importance of customer feedback.

- Agreed to discuss renewal later due to time constraints.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a satisfaction survey via email.

- Executive will call the customer to discuss renewal.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- negative feedback, renewal, trade india, visibility
